sourcesContent:
export const sliderItems = [
  {
    id: "gengar",
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/437x437/106521.jpg",
    title: "Gengar",
    desc: "Sword and Shield Pack",
    condition: "Mint Condition",
    price: "Price: $74.88",
    bg: "7A0BC0",
    descbg: "270082",
    id2: "pikachu",
    img2: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/147229.jpg",
    title2: "Pikachu",
    desc2: "(Red Cheeks)",
    condition2: "Mint Condition",
    price2: "Price: $400.59",
    id3: "charizard",
    img3: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42382.jpg",
    title3: "Charizard",
    desc3: "Base Set",

    price3: "Price: $5,000,000.00",
  },
  {

    title2: "Pikachu",
    desc2: "(Red Cheeks)",
    condition2: "Mint Condition",
    price2: "Price: $400.59",
    id3: "charizard",
    img3: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42382.jpg",
    title3: "Charizard",
    desc3: "Base Set",
    condition3: "Mint Condition",
    price3: "Price: $5,000,000.00",
  },
];

export const categories = [
  {
    id: 1,
    img: "https://i.ebayimg.com/images/g/oGQAAOSwRk5ftaQJ/s-l1600.jpg",
    title: "Yugi-Oh",
  },

  {
    id: 2,
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/147229.jpg",
    title: "Pokemon",
  },

  {
    id: 3,
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/147229.jpg",
    title: "Marvel",
  },

  {
    id: 4,
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/147229.jpg",
    title: "Sports",
  },
];

export let CardList = [
  {
    category: "Pokemon",
    cardset: "Base Set",
    condition: "Mint Condition",
    grade: "Not Graded",
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42408.jpg",
    price: "$28.37",
    title: "Squirtle",
  },
  {
    category: "Pokemon",
    cardset: "Base Set",
    condition: "Mint Condition",
    grade: "Not Graded",
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42408.jpg",
    price: "$28.37dfad",
    title: "Blastoise",
  },
  {
    category: "Pokemon",
    cardset: "Base Set",
    condition: "Mint Condition",
    grade: "Not Graded",
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42408.jpg",
    price: "$28.334214ad",
    title: "charizard",
  },
  {
    category: "Pokemon",
    cardset: "Base Set",
    condition: "Mint Condition",
    grade: "Not Graded",
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42408.jpg",
    price: "$28.37",
    title: "Squirtle",
  },
  {
    category: "Pokemon",
    cardset: "Base Set",
    condition: "Mint Condition",
    grade: "Not Graded",
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42408.jpg",
    price: "$28.37dfad",
    title: "Blastoise",
  },
  {
    category: "Pokemon",
    cardset: "Base Set",
    condition: "Mint Condition",
    grade: "Not Graded",
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42408.jpg",
    price: "$28.334214ad",
    title: "charizard",
  },
  {
    category: "Pokemon",
    cardset: "Base Set",
    condition: "Mint Condition",
    grade: "Not Graded",
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42408.jpg",
    price: "$28.37",
    title: "Squirtle",
  },
  {
    category: "Pokemon",
    cardset: "Base Set",
    condition: "Mint Condition",
    grade: "Not Graded",
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42408.jpg",
    price: "$28.37dfad",
    title: "Blastoise",
  },
  {
    category: "Pokemon",
    cardset: "Base Set",
    condition: "Mint Condition",
    grade: "Not Graded",
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42408.jpg",
    price: "$28.334214ad",
    title: "charizard",
  },
  {
    category: "Pokemon",
    cardset: "Base Set",
    condition: "Mint Condition",
    grade: "Not Graded",
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42408.jpg",
    price: "$28.37dfad",
    title: "Blastoise",
  },
  {
    category: "Pokemon",
    cardset: "Base Set",
    condition: "Mint Condition",
    grade: "Not Graded",
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42408.jpg",
    price: "$28.334214ad",
    title: "charizard",
  },
];

export const sliderCardList = [
  {
    category: "Pokemon",
    cardset: "Base Set",
    condition: "Mint Condition",
    grade: "Not Graded",
    img: "https://product-images.tcgplayer.com/fit-in/540x540/42408.jpg",
    price: "$28.37",
    title: "Squirtle",
  },
];

export const createCard = (cardObject) => {
  let category = cardObject.category;
  let cardset = cardObject.cardset;
  let condition = cardObject.condition;
  let grade = cardObject.grade;
  let img = cardObject.img;
  let price = cardObject.price;
  let title = cardObject.title;
  let cardTemplate = `
  <Container >
            <CardWrapper>
                
                
                    <CardDetailsWrapper>
                        <CardImg src='${img}' /> 
                        <CardInfoWrapper>
                            <CardCatergory>
                                ${category}
                            </CardCatergory>
                            <CardSet>
                                ${cardset}
                            </CardSet>
                            <Title>
                                ${title}
                            </Title>

                            <GradeWrapper>
                                PSA: ${grade}
                            </GradeWrapper>

                            <CardCondition>
                                ${condition}
                            </CardCondition>

                            <PriceContainer>
                                Price:
                                <Price>
                                ${price}
                            </Price>
                            </PriceContainer>

                            <ButtonWrapper>
                                <Button>Add to Cart</Button>
                            </ButtonWrapper>
                            
                        </CardInfoWrapper>
                    </CardDetailsWrapper>
                
                
            
                </CardWrapper>
        </Container>
  `;
  return cardTemplate;
};

export const createCardListObj = (
  category,
  cardset,
  condition,
  grade,
  img,
  price,
  title
) => {
  CardList.push({
    category: category,
    cardset: cardset,
    condition: condition,
    grade: grade,
    img: img,
    price: price,
    title: title,
  });
};

createCardListObj(
  "Pokemon",
  "Base Set",
  "Mint Condition",
  "Not Graded",
  "https://tcgplayer-cdn.tcgplayer.com/product/42387_200w.jpg",
  "$457.00",
  "Bulbasaur"
);
